title: Enakoru Snegithi Lyrics Priyamanavale
stanzas:
Enakoru snegithi snegithi
thendral maadhiri
nee oru pournami pournami
pesum payingili

un mugam paarkka
thondrinaal pookkalai
paarthu kolgiren
pookkalin kadhil mellamaai
un peyar solli paarkiren

Enakoru snegithi snegithi
thendral maadhiri
nee oru pournami pournami
pesum payingili

un mugam paarkka
thondrinaal pookkalai
paarthu kolgiren
pookkalin kadhil sellamaai
un peyar solli paarkiren

megam adhu seraadhu
vaan mazhaiyum vaaraadhu
thanimaiyil thavippene
unai ennai ilaitheney

mel imaiyum vaaraadhu
keezh imaiyum sseraadhu
unakidhu puriyaadhaa
ilakkanam theriyaadhaa

sammathangal ullapodhum
varthai ondru solla vendum
vaarthai vandhu serum podhu
naanam ennai katti podum

Enakoru snegithi snegithi
thendral maadhiri
nee oru pournami pournami
pesum payingili

Kai valaiyal kulungaamal
kaal kolusu sinungaamal
anaippadhu sugamaagum
adhu oru thavamaagum

mogam oru poo pola
theendiyathum theepola
kanavugal oru kodi
nee kodu en thozhi

unnai thandhu ennai
neeyum vaagi kondu
naatkal aachu.

unnai thotta pinbuthaane
mutkal kooda pookkal aachu

Enakoru snegithi snegithi
thendral maadhiri
nee oru pournami pournami
pesum payingili

un mugam paarkka
thondrinaal pookkalai
paarthu kolgiren
pookkalin kadhil sellamaai
un peyar solli paarkiren
